fxwindow.fxmove

Class FXMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • fxwindow.fxmove.FXMove

  • public class FXMove
extends java.lang.Object

    This class allows to move your undecorated JavaFX window

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ivan Zhen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FXMove()
      Creates empty FXMove object
      FXMove(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Creates FXMove object with root element of stage

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dragToCenter(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Minimizes the window when it is maximized and is dragged to the center
      void dragToUp(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Maximize the window when its dragged to upper and released
      boolean isDraggedToUp(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Check if window is dragged to upper
      void moveDragged(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Move the window when drag the move panel
      void movePressed(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Captures windows position when clicked on move panel
      void setContext(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Sets root elemet of stage for FXMove object
